root.name: Penalty of Heroes
root.description: OverviewThe game mixes the familiar tropes of the side-scrolling arcade brawler genre with some RPG-like character progression. It's exploration of the world of Nimo encompasses ten levels along with requisite epic boss battles to cap them off. Each character will have distinct abilities as well as options to further distinguish by choosing upgrades as the character progresses.
